description:
The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enter God Eneru! Farewell to the Survivors!
God Enel Toujou!! Ikinokori e no Aubade
Le Dieu Ener apparaît ! Aubade pour les survivants !
ظهور الإله إنيل! أنشودة فراق للنّاجين!
ก็อดเอเนลูเผยโฉม! บทเพลงสู่ผู้รอดชีวิต
神[ゴッド]・エネル登場!! 生き残りへの夜明曲[オーパード]
